snippet: The officers, Dennis Spaulding and David Cari, were among several members of the East Haven Police Department in Connecticut implicated in a Justice Department investigation.
abstract: Federal trial of East Haven, Conn, Police Officers Dennis Spaulding and David Cari, accused of harassing Latinos, concludes with lawyers in case presenting very different views of officers and how they did their jobs; officers are among several members of East Haven Police Department implicated in Justice Department investigation.
lead_paragraph: The officers, Dennis Spaulding and David Cari, were among several members of the East Haven Police Department in Connecticut implicated in a Justice Department investigation.

headline.main: 2 Officers Accused of Harassing Latinos Now Await Verdict
headline.print_headline: 2 Officers Accused of Harassing Latinos Now Await Verdict
